title: constant bugsplats
body: as you can tell from the title, i've been getting constant bugsplats. often once per game, sometimes more. i'm on windows 10, and i have a computer better than most people. i've also seen other players get bugsplats very often. a lot more often than last season. is anybody else getting these problems? is there a fix? i'd like to get gold before the end of the season but it doesn't seem that easy with this problem

replies.body: Bugsplats in game can be caused by a number of different potential causes, but problematic drivers or hardware are the most common. Take a look at our [Bugsplat & Crash guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) for some of the most common solutions, and let me know if this issue persists after trying those steps.
